meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of czars or czarism.
meanings.sent1: The grand palace was decorated with czarists paintings.
meanings.sent2: The traditional clothing worn by the czarists was elaborate and ornate.
meanings.sent3: The czarists decorations in the room made it feel like a royal chamber.
meanings.sent4: Her elegant manners were reminiscent of the czarists of old.
meanings.sent5: The czarists architecture of the building was truly majestic.

meanings.sent1: The czarists gathered in the square to show their loyalty.
meanings.sent2: The czarists believed in the absolute power of the ruler.
meanings.sent3: The czarists threw a party to celebrate their beliefs.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the czarists, the ruler could do no wrong.
meanings.sent5: The czarists proudly displayed their allegiance to the monarchy.
